edited_stories.edited_story_text: A group of people gathered to jump in the freezing cold water. It was a perfect day at the lake to jump in the icy cold water. There was a good amount of people show up. The water was not too icy & the weather wasn't too cold for the challenge. Afterwards, everyone gathered on the beach with dry clothes & blankets.
